meanings.definition: Ornamental metalwork on a boat or other vehicle, typically made of polished brass or other shiny material.
meanings.sent1: The brightwork on the ship gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The brightwork on the car added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The seagull perched on the brightwork, admiring its reflection.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as the brightwork on the yacht.
meanings.sent5: The brightwork sparkled like a treasure trove of gold.

meanings.definition: The act of polishing or cleaning metalwork to make it shiny.
meanings.sent1: He spent hours doing brightwork on the antique silverware.
meanings.sent2: The brightwork on the motorcycle required regular maintenance.
meanings.sent3: She joked that brightwork was her favorite form of exercise.
meanings.sent4: The brightwork on the gate shone like a beacon in the night.
meanings.sent5: The brightwork glistened under the meticulous care of the craftsman.
